Daytime: magical razzle dazzle sparkles glimmer beneath the dancing rays of the sun
clouds were beginning to part for the rays of the sun
the hills were blazed in gentle apricot light
indigo hues deepened as daylight waned over hills and fields
Latin: Si enim posset imaginari avolabunt in luna
Unquam imaginari posse, est maior in terra quam tibi
Nos mos ledo una die dissipatur meteoron
Credo in te, et eris beatus
Nighttime: the distant stars magnified the silence
tranquility floated you to the silence of the moon
the crystalline night lit up brilliant with stars
the stars winked down at the earth one by one in the darkened sky
the big dipper sat heavy in the western sky
night sky beckoned a thousand distance stars
